org.mini2Dx.core.font

Interface GameFontCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitmapFontCache, MonospaceFontCache

    public interface GameFontCache
    Caches glyph geometry for fast rendering of static text

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addText

        void addText(java.lang.CharSequence str,
             float x,
             float y)
        Adds text to the cache
        Parameters:
        str - The text to be added
        x - The x coordinate to add the text to
        y - The y coordinate to add the text to

      • addText

        void addText(java.lang.CharSequence str,
             float x,
             float y,
             float targetWidth,
             int halign,
             boolean wrap)
        Adds text to the cache
        Parameters:
        str - The text to be added
        x - The x coordinate to add the text to
        y - The y coordinate to add the text to
        targetWidth - The target width of the text (text will wrap if exceeded)
        halign - The horizontal alignment of the text based on Align

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all text from the cache

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics g)
        Draws the cache to the Graphics context
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context to draw to

        The Color to draw with

        void setAllAlphas(float alpha)
        Sets the Color alpha for previous text operations

      • setText

        void setText(java.lang.CharSequence str,
             float x,
             float y)
        Clears all text from the cache and adds a new text sequence
        Parameters:
        str - The text to be added
        x - The x coordinate to add the text to
        y - The y coordinate to add the text to

      • setText

        void setText(java.lang.CharSequence str,
             float x,
             float y,
             float targetWidth,
             int halign,
             boolean wrap)
        Clears all text from the cache and adds a new text sequence
        Parameters:
        str - The text to be added
        x - The x coordinate to add the text to
        y - The y coordinate to add the text to
        targetWidth - The target width of the text (text will wrap if exceeded)
        halign - The horizontal alignment of the text based on Align
        wrap - True if the text should wrap when exceeding the targetWidth, false if the text should clip

      • translate

        void translate(float x,
               float y)
        Sets the position of the text relative to its current position
        Parameters:
        x - The amount to move by on the x axis
        y - The amount to move by on the y axis

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(float x,
                 float y)
        Sets the position of the cache
        Parameters:
        x - The amount to move by on the x axis
        y - The amount to move by on the y axis

      • getFont

        GameFont getFont()
        Returns the underlying GameFont for this cache
        Returns:
        The GameFont this cache was created for
